subject: Building (Construction)
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Organizers face extraordinary hurdles, from humidity to bureaucracy, in the construction of a 42,000-seat stadium in Manaus, a city in the midst of the rain forest.
snippet: Organizers face extraordinary hurdles, from humidity to bureaucracy, in the construction of a 42,000-seat stadium in Manaus, a city in the midst of the rain forest.
